item.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition now available for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

A free upgrade for existing owners.

Publisher Bethesda Softworks and developer Bethesda Game Studios have released a Switch 2 version of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition. It is available as a free upgrade for users who own the Anniversary Edition on Switch.

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC on November 11, 2021, followed by Switch on September 28, 2022.

Here is an overview of the Switch 2 version, via Bethesda Softworks:

Winner of over 200 Game of the Year Awards, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition returns with a newly enhanced adventure for Nintendo Switch 2. It brings the legendary open-world fantasy experience to life like never before, at home or on the go.

Owners of the Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch can download the game for free on Nintendo Switch 2, while owners of the base edition on Nintendo Switch can purchase the “Anniversary Upgrade” to then download the game on Nintendo Switch 2.

This version includes:

  • The Complete Skyrim Experience – Dive into the acclaimed base game and the three official expansions: Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn.
  • Enhanced for Nintendo Switch 2 – Enjoy enhanced resolution, improved load times, and optimized performance (as compared to Nintendo Switch) that take full advantage of the Nintendo Switch 2’s advanced hardware.
  • Hundreds of Creation Club Items – Discover a massive library of community-favorite content, including new quests, weapons, armor, spells, dungeons, and more.
  • Play Your Way – Forge your own story in a world that reacts to your choices. Be a stealthy assassin, powerful mage, noble warrior, or something entirely your own.

Whether you’re a longtime fan or stepping into Skyrim for the very first time, the Skyrim Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch 2 delivers the definitive way to experience this iconic fantasy RPG.

item.title: PEGI rates Assassin’s Creed Black Flag Resynced
item.content:encoded:
Pan European Game Information has rated the unannounced Assassin’s Creed Black Flag Resynced. Platforms are not listed.

The rating comes two weeks after Reddit user thequaliti claimed to have found the following text among the localization tables for Assassin’s Creed Shadows:

Assassin’s Creed Black Flag Resynced is a work of historical fiction created by a diverse team. While inspired by historical events, people, and locations, it remains a work of fiction in which creative liberties have been taken to adapt it to the interactive format of a video game.

A remake of Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag has been long rumored. With The Game Awards 2025 set to air on December 11, we might see an official announcement there.

Thanks, @TheHiddenOneAC.

item.title: LEGO Voyagers ‘Cross-Play’ update now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Play with users across platforms.

Publisher Annapurna Interactive and developer Light Brick Studio have released a free update for cooperative adventure game LEGO Voyagers that adds cross-play support across all platforms.

Here is an overview of the game, via Annapurna Interactive:

About

From the makers of LEGO Builder’s Journey comes a new two-player cooperative adventure about friendship and play. When two friends make it their mission to rescue an abandoned spaceship, they embark on a journey beyond their wildest dreams, ultimately learning the value of being connected.

  • Experience what it feels like to be a LEGO brick. Tumble, jump, snap together, and build your way through rich brick worlds.
  • Unravel a poetic, non verbal narrative, set in beautiful brick built environments, supported by an atmospheric soundtrack.
  • Cooperatively solve the game’s many challenges and discover how two bricks are better than one. Play locally on the same screen, or online.
  • Invite a friend to join your adventure for free with the Friend’s Pass. As long as one of you owns LEGO Voyagers, you can both play the full co-op experience together.

LEGO Voyagers asks open questions about building friendships, sharing dreams, and giving space.

It reminds us that while playing and being creative is for all shapes and sizes, it’s always better when you share it with a friend.

LEGO Voyagers is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem – PlayStation Store box art leak reveals Leon S. Kennedy
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Long-rumored return finally confirmed.

PlayStation Store has leaked an updated box art for Resident Evil Requiem featuring Leon S. Kennedy behind the previously announced protagonist Grace Ashcroft, suggesting he might return as a playable character.

The updated box art, which seems to only be visible on console, was spotted by various users across social media (Bluewav, Rayan_ha8y, SpookyHoo, Bogdan47, etc.)

Here is a high-quality version of the artwork, via ResetEra user LEONSKR4:

A new trailer for Resident Evil Requiem will premiere at The Game Awards 2025 on December 11, where it is likely Leon S. Kennedy will see a formal reveal.

Resident Evil Requiem is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on February 27, 2026.

Thanks, r/GamingLeaksandRumours.
